content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseDelimitedTextFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseDelimitedTextFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT ,
	       FORMAT_OPTIONS (
			 FIELD_TERMINATOR = ',',
			 USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = FALSE
			))
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'adlsnycpayroll-ahlam-a_bikesharestorage_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [adlsnycpayroll-ahlam-a_bikesharestorage_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://adlsnycpayroll-ahlam-a@bikesharestorage.dfs.core.windows.net', 
		TYPE = HADOOP 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE [dbo].[NYC_Payroll_Data_2021] (
	[FiscalYear] [varchar](20) NULL,
    [PayrollNumber][varchar](20) NULL,
    [AgencyID] [varchar](20) NULL,
    [AgencyName] [varchar](50) NULL,
    [EmployeeID] [varchar](20) NULL,
    [LastName] [varchar](20) NULL,
    [FirstName] [varchar](20) NULL,
    [AgencyStartDate] varchar(50) NULL,
    [WorkLocationBorough] [varchar](50) NULL,
    [TitleCode] [varchar](20) NULL,
    [TitleDescription] [varchar](100) NULL,
    [LeaveStatusasofJune30] [varchar](50) NULL,
    [BaseSalary] [varchar] (50) NULL,
    [PayBasis] [varchar](50) NULL,
    [RegularHours] [varchar](50) NULL,
    [RegularGrossPaid] [varchar](50) NULL,
    [OTHours] [varchar](50) NULL,
    [TotalOTPaid] [varchar](50) NULL,
    [TotalOtherPay] [varchar](50) NULL
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'dirpayrollfiles/nycpayroll_2021.csv',
	DATA_SOURCE = [adlsnycpayroll-ahlam-a_bikesharestorage_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseDelimitedTextFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM [dbo].[NYC_Payroll_Data_2021]
GO

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


CREATE TABLE [dbo].[NYC_Payroll_Data]
 (
	[FiscalYear] [varchar](20) NULL,
    [PayrollNumber][varchar](20) NULL,
    [AgencyID] [varchar](20) NULL,
    [AgencyName] [varchar](50) NULL,
    [EmployeeID] [varchar](20) NULL,
    [LastName] [varchar](20) NULL,
    [FirstName] [varchar](20) NULL,
    [AgencyStartDate] varchar(50) NULL,
    [WorkLocationBorough] [varchar](50) NULL,
    [TitleCode] [varchar](20) NULL,
    [TitleDescription] [varchar](100) NULL,
    [LeaveStatusasofJune30] [varchar](50) NULL,
    [BaseSalary] [varchar] (50) NULL,
    [PayBasis] [varchar](50) NULL,
    [RegularHours] [varchar](50) NULL,
    [RegularGrossPaid] [varchar](50) NULL,
    [OTHours] [varchar](50) NULL,
    [TotalOTPaid] [varchar](50) NULL,
    [TotalOtherPay] [varchar](50) NULL
	)
	
WITH (   
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX,
    DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN
)



SELECT TOP 100 * FROM [dbo].[NYC_Payroll_Data]


CREATE TABLE [dbo].[NYC_Payroll_EMP] (
	[EmployeeID] [varchar](10) NULL,
    [LastName] [varchar](20) NULL,
    [FirstName] [varchar](20) NULL
	)
WITH (   
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX,
    DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN
)

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM [dbo].[NYC_Payroll_EMP]


CREATE  TABLE [dbo].[NYC_Payroll_AGENCY](
    [AgencyID] [varchar](10) NULL,
    [AgencyName] [varchar](50) NULL
)
WITH (   
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX,
    DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN
)

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM [dbo].[NYC_Payroll_AGENCY]


CREATE TABLE [dbo].[NYC_Payroll_TITLE](
    [TitleCode] [varchar](10) NULL,
    [TitleDescription] [varchar](100) NULL
)
WITH (   
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX,
    DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN
)

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM [dbo].[NYC_Payroll_TITLE]

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------



 CREATE TABLE [dbo].[NYC_Payroll_Summary](
     [FiscalYear] [int] NULL, 
     [AgencyName] [varchar](50) NULL, 
     [TotalPaid] [float] NULL )
     WITH (   
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX,
    DISTRIBUTION = HASH(FiscalYear)
)

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM [dbo].[NYC_Payroll_Summary]
